槬槬槬

槬字的基本解释

槬
huà
宽大：“而钟，音之器也，……小者不窕，大者不槬。”

槬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huà］
［《字彙》胡卦切］
洪大。

槬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页547第11
【廣韻】【正韻】【韻會】?胡化切，華去聲。鐘橫大也。【正字通】摦字之譌。【左傳】从木。【昭二十一年】天王將鑄無射，冷州鳩曰：夫鐘，小者不窕，大者不槬。窕則不咸，槬則不容。今鐘槬矣。

槬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
槬字的起名意思

暂无。

槬
Basic explanation of words
槬
huà
Generous: "And the bell, the instrument of sound,...the small one is not slender, and the big one is not lithe."
槬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huà］
[Hu Gua cut in "Words"]
loud.
槬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 547 11
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Hu Huaqie, Hua Qusheng. Zhong Heng is also big. 【Zhengzitong】Lianzizhizhi. [Zuo Zhuan] Congmu. [The twenty-first year of the Show] The king will cast no shots, Lengzhou Jiu said: Husband's clock, the small is not slender, and the big is not sturdy. The 窕 is not salty, and the 槬 is not tolerant. Today is the clock.
